Class GUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • GUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class GUI
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    GUI class used to display and interact with information from a MySQL database graphically.
    Since:
    2013-05-15
    Author:
    Casey Scarborough
    See Also:
    Database, Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  GUI.ListenForAction
      ActionListener implementation to listen for actions such as button clicks.
      private class  GUI.ListenForFocus
      FocusListener implementation used to listen for JTextFields being focused on.
      private class  GUI.ListenForMouse
      ListenForMouse class that listens for mouse events on cells so that they can be updated.
